SELECT
FROM t_biz_repayment_plan r INNER JOIN t_biz_borrow b ON (b.pid = r.borrow_id) WHERE r.pid = #{repayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT b.borrow_code, b.borrow_name, b.borrow_money, b.borrow_rate, b.manage_expense_rate, b.bor_deadline, FUNC_GET_DICT_CONT_NAME ( 'REPAYMENT_TYPE', b.repayment_type ) AS repayment_type_name, SUM(IFNULL(r.capital, 0)) AS repaid_capital, SUM(IFNULL(r.interest, 0)) AS repaid_interest, (select SUM(IFNULL(interest,0)) from t_biz_repayment_plan c where c.receipt_paln_status = 7 and c.borrow_id = r.borrow_id) as advance_repay_interest, SUM( IFNULL(r.management_cost, 0) ) AS repaid_management_cost, (select SUM(IFNULL(management_cost,0)) from t_biz_repayment_plan c where c.receipt_paln_status = 7 and c.borrow_id = r.borrow_id) as advance_repay_management_cost, SUM(IFNULL(r.latefee, 0))+SUM(IFNULL(r.prepayment_fee,0)) AS repaid_penalty, (select SUM(IFNULL(latefee,0)) from t_biz_repayment_plan c where c.borrow_id = r.borrow_id) as latefee, (select SUM(IFNULL(prepayment_fee,0)) from t_biz_repayment_plan c where c.borrow_id = r.borrow_id) as prepayment_fee FROM t_biz_borrow b INNER JOIN t_biz_repayment_plan r ON (r.borrow_id = b.PID) WHERE b.`status` = 1 AND r.`status` = 1 AND b.PID = #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT b.borrow_code, b.borrow_name, b.borrow_money, b.borrow_rate, b.manage_expense_rate, b.bor_deadline, FUNC_GET_DICT_CONT_NAME ( 'REPAYMENT_TYPE', b.repayment_type ) AS repayment_type_name, SUM(IFNULL(r.capital, 0)) AS capital, SUM(IFNULL(r.interest, 0)) AS interest, SUM( IFNULL(r.management_cost, 0) ) AS management_cost, SUM(IFNULL(r.latefee, 0)) AS latefee FROM t_biz_borrow b INNER JOIN t_biz_repayment_plan r ON (r.borrow_id = b.PID) WHERE b.`status` = 1 AND r.`status` = 1 AND r.receipt_paln_status in (2,3) AND b.PID = #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT r.planindex as current_planindex, r.capital, r.interest, r.management_cost, r.latefee, b.bor_deadline AS max_planindex FROM t_biz_repayment_plan r INNER JOIN t_biz_borrow b ON (b.PID = r.borrow_id) WHERE r.`status` = 1 AND r.receipt_paln_status in (2,3) AND r.borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM t_biz_repayment_plan r INNER JOIN t_biz_borrow b ON (b.pid = r.borrow_id) WHERE r.borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND r.`status` = 1 AND r.expire_time > NOW() AND r.receipt_paln_status = 1 ORDER BY r.expire_time LIMIT 0, 1
